name: www.smockle.com
description: Main website of Clay Miller (Smockle): https://smockle.com

scripts.deploy: cd public && aws s3 sync . s3://smockle.com --region us-west-2 --acl public-read --cache-control 'max-age=2629000' --exclude '*.html' && aws s3 sync . s3://smockle.com --region us-west-2 --acl public-read --cache-control 'max-age=0, no-cache' --exclude '*' --include '*.html'

author: Clay Miller <clay@smockle.com> (http://www.smockle.com)
